about.title: About
about.subtitle: Engineer who hardens the foundation from platforms to realtime servers
about.mission: Ship new services fast while architecting a solid core and proving quality with data.

overview.paragraph1: I have built realtime game servers, backend platforms, fintech trading systems, blockchain services, and AI RAG pipelines. I pick the right stack for each problem—C++/C#, Kotlin/Spring, TypeScript/NestJS, Python/FastAPI—without hesitating to learn new layers.
overview.paragraph2: Large-scale traffic and high-stake services shaped my bar for stability. I operated products that handle 22 billion KRW AUM, delivered a patent-pending MCP proxy, and launched a 1Gi memory knowledge search service that users rely on.
overview.paragraph3: I care about how teams grow together. Code reviews, documentation, and automated tests make quality shareable, and public talks or OSS work feed the community back.

ai.title: AI / Knowledge Platform
ai.description: Designed and implemented RAG pipelines, MCP proxies, and AI agents with extreme cost/memory optimization.

fintech.title: Fintech & Trading
fintech.description: Led robo advisor, investment, and reward services as PL/IC, keeping mission-critical finance flows reliable.

realtime.title: Realtime Game Platform
realtime.description: Created C/C++ room servers, RPC frameworks, and reusable backends that powered dozens of launches.

devops.title: DevOps & Infra
devops.description: Operate AWS/GCP, Kubernetes, Terraform, Helm, and automation pipelines that enforce release quality.

sdk.title: Client / SDK
sdk.description: Build Unity/Android SDKs and tooling like the MCP registry CLI to elevate developer experience.

community.title: Community & Sharing
community.description: Give talks (Google DevFest, Hackpair) and contribute to OSS to circulate ideas and lessons.

items.item1: Core-first: architect the backbone, then scale features rapidly.
items.item2: Observable delivery: prove quality with metrics, logs, and profilers.
items.item3: Hands-on leadership: unblock teams by writing code as a PL/IC.
items.item4: Knowledge sharing: keep reviews, docs, and talks active so the team levels up together.
